p: When Eu 3+ ions occupy sites with this punctual symmetry, the 5D 0 → 7F 0 transition is allowed and can be observed in the emission spectra. In our case, at room temperature the 5D 0 → 7F 0 transition is present only in PL spectra of ferroelectric materials and between −20 °C and −100 °C in relaxors depending on their composition, indicating a non-zero probability for displacements along [110] and [111] directions.
